name: Panic Fruit
description:
Edit: Update color correction world color black

Hello people.
I recently participated in Ludumdare 46 and created this game in 24 hours on the UPbge engine. Hope you like it!!!
Game Jam: Ludum Dare 46
Theme: Keep it alive
Game style: Dangerous maze
Highlight: The difficulty is in the physics of the game
Platform: Window (created in window 64)
Game engine: UPbge 0.2.4 (bge fork, blender)
Other apps: Audacity / Gimp / Python
Website: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/panic-fruit
DOWNLOAD THE GAME:

1- https://adamantil.itch.io/panicfruit

2- https://gamejolt.com/games/panicfruit/488122

3- https://drive.google.com/open?id=1lI82rFPFL1tE9Hy9Yj4vXmwE03wjVPJp

I am grateful to play, thank you !!!
